meanings.definition: The area surrounding a particular place or location.
meanings.sent1: The park's environs were filled with trees and flowers.
meanings.sent2: We explored the environs of the old castle.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel in the environs seemed to be playing hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the environs like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful environs of the countryside were a welcome escape from the city.

meanings.definition: The surroundings or vicinity of a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The bustling city environs were alive with activity.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a picnic in the environs of the lake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat in the environs kept stealing socks.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the storm clouds enveloped the environs in an ominous shroud.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the natural environs left us in awe of the world around us.
